EntryName	GLYL1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Glycine N-acyltransferase-like protein 1 (EC 2.3.1.68) (Acyl-CoA:glycine N-acyltransferase-like protein 1) (Glutamine N-acyltransferase)
GeneName	GLYATL1 GNAT
Length	302
Function	Acyltransferase which transfers an acyl group to the N-terminus of glutamine. Can use phenylacetyl-CoA as an acyl donor.
